name: Canary Inc.
description: Developer of an online real estate platform designed to help customers search for a property using the Internet. The company's platform matches agents with customers, enabling buyers to interact with agencies and get access to the property rapidly and cost-effectively.
one_liner: Developer of an online real estate platform designed to help customers search for a property using the Internet. The company's platform matches agents with customers, enabling buyers to interact with agencies and get access to the property rapidly and cost-effectively.
